articles.title: Sheriff's Department: Driver arrested in 2-dead DUI crash
articles.description: TUCSON, Ariz. (AP) — A man who was the driver in a single-vehicle DUI car crash that killed two passengers has been arrested on suspicion of murder and other crimes, the Pima County Sheriff's Department said Friday.
articles.content:
TUCSON, Ariz. (AP) A man who was the driver in a single-vehicle DUI car crash that killed two passengers has been arrested on suspicion of murder and other crimes, the Pima County Sheriff's Department said Friday.

articles.title: Man accused of kidnapping ex-girlfriend could get life term

articles.title: Alaska behind schedule to send inmates to private prisons
articles.description: ANCHORAGE, Alaska (AP) — Alaska's Department of Corrections is a month behind its own schedule to transfer inmates to private prisons in the lower 48 states, officials said.

articles.title: Vermont police say man dies after car strikes tree in Derby
articles.description: DERBY, Vt. (AP) — A 71-year-old man died after the car he was driving went off a road in the town of Derby and hit a tree, Vermont State Police said.
articles.content:
DERBY, Vt. (AP) A 71-year-old man died after the car he was driving went off a road in the town of Derby and hit a tree, Vermont State Police said.

articles.title: Defense: No alcohol in fatal crash involving ex-astronaut

articles.title: Puerto Ricans settle in quake shelters, refuse to go home

articles.title: Arizona impeachment trial judge Frank Gordon Jr. dies at 90
articles.description: PHOENIX (AP) — Frank X. Gordon Jr., a former Arizona Supreme Court chief justice who drew high marks for how he presided over the 1988 impeachment trial that resulted in the removal of Gov. Evan Mecham, has died.
articles.content:

articles.description: NEWPORT, Maine (AP) — A Maine man has been charged with killing his wife, state police said.

NEWPORT, Maine (AP) A Maine man has been charged with killing his wife, state police said.
